lead_paragraph: TARRYTOWN, N.Y. -- I got the chance last week to drive Hyundai's coming $60,000 luxury sedan, the Equus, here in the Hudson River Valley.
snippet: The slow scroll of the Equus iPod integration system means all your songs are not quite at your fingertips.

headline.main: A Brief Drive in the 2011 Hyundai Equus Raises a Small Gripe

abstract: The slow scroll of the Equus iPod integration system means all your songs are not quite at your fingertips.
